title: Welcome to Momentum.
sub_title: Start creating your roadmap for growth.

magic_link.intro: To log-into Momentum, please click the link below to login. This link may be used multiple times until it expires in 5 days.
magic_link.subject: Login to Momentum

validate.empty: You must enter your password to continue

auth.missing_user_by_email: A user with that email could not be found.
auth.magic_link_sent: An email has been sent to address :email containing a link to complete your login into Momentum.
auth.invalid_token: This login link is incorrect or has expired.

password_submit_instructions: Enter the password for user :email to continue.
inactive: Your account is inactive. Please contact MRG customer support.

forgot_email.title: Having Trouble Signing In?
forgot_email.message: If you are not sure how to sign-in, please contact MRG Client Services at clientservices@mrg.com.

browser_outdated: Your browser version is not supported. Please update to the latest version.
